content: made on the wrong side of our work and it will be invisible from the right side its only role will be to support the next rounds make 6 chain to climb down from the picot make 1 single_crochet to the top of the puff from round #8 on the wrong side repeat 12 times 7 chain single_crochet in the top of the puff from round #8 on the wrong side don t make the single_crochet in the last repeat instead close the round with a slip_stitch turn the work so that you face the right side again we have 12 7ch-spaces separated by single_crochet s round #12 make a double_crochet in every chain and every single_crochet the first double_crochet in this round should be made into an single_crochet close the round with a slip_stitch we have 12* 7+1 =12*8=96 double_crochet s all around round #13 repeat 12 times 1 single_crochet in the double_crochet that was made on an single_crochet 2 single_crochet in the next two stitches 2 chain and skip the next stitch 1 puff around the 4th double_crochet the middle one of the 7 double_crochet s made in the 7ch-space 2 chain and skip the next stitch 2 single_crochet in the next two stitches close the round with a slip_stitch we have started 12 new petals they are puff stitches separated by 2 chain on each side and 5 single_crochet s in between magic carpet studio www facebook com/magiccarpetstudio/ www magiccarpetstudio blogspot com round #14 this round starts on the 3rd single_crochet the middle one of 5 single_crochet s repeat 12 times 1 single_crochet in the middle single_crochet skip the next 2 single_crochet s in the 2ch-space make 3 double_crochet and 2 tc 3 tc in the top of the puff in the 2ch-space make 2 tc and 3 double_crochet skip the next two single_crochet s close the round with a slip_stitch we have 12 petals of 3 double_crochet + 7 tc + 3 double_crochet separated by 1 single_crochet round #15 repeat 12 times 1 single_crochet in the single_crochet 13 bpdc close the round with a slip_stitch we have 12 petals of 13 bpdc separated by 1 single_crochet round #16 in this round we will skip the first and the last bpdc of each petal repeat 12 times single_crochet in the picot of round #10 1 half_double_crochet in the 2nd bpdc repeat 4 times puff around the next bpdc 2 half_double_crochet in the next bpdc puff around the 3rd bpdc from the end 1 half_double_crochet in the 2nd bpdc from the end close the round with a slip_stitch we have 12 petals of alternating half_double_crochet s and puff stitches separated by single_crochet s round #17 in this round we will skip the lonely half_double_crochet s at the beginning and at the end of each petal repeat 12 times fpsc around the single_crochet which was made in the picot 6 double_crochet the 1st one will be made in the first puff stitch on the petal in the middle puff
